Description: Killer guitar, great price! In good condition overall. Would benefit from a string-change; action is set very low. Comes with gigbag and trem arm. Painted black and styled in a Kamikaze graphic, the LTD GL-200K George Lynch Signature Series Model is an electric guitar from ESP featuring a basswood body and a double-cutaway design. Its bolt-on maple neck has a 25.5″ scale, and is fitted with a rosewood fingerboard and 22 extra-jumbo frets. The strings are secured by a set of LTD tuners, along with a Floyd Rose Special locking tremolo bridge.For electronics, this guitar is equipped with a pair of ESP Designed pickups—an LS-120N single coil in the neck position and an LH-150B humbucker in the bridge position. To minimize the number of knobs and switches, a single master volume control also functions as a push/pull pickup selector to switch between the single coil and humbucker.Neck FeaturesNeck type: 3-piece mapleNut width: 43mm Nut type: Locking Neck contour: GL Original U General Features Body: Basswood Hardware color: Black Nickel Strap buttons: Standard
Title: ESP LTD GL-200K George Lynch Signature Guitar - Kamikaze Graphic - Reverse Neck
ConditionDescription: Great guitar! I recommend a new set of strings, and this bad boy will rock!  Floyd rose special is decent at this price point. Make me an offer! Will come with trem arm. No gigbag or case at this time.
